entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
SNOW ACCUMULATION UP TO 1 INCH
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 80 PERCENT

SNOW
SNOW MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES IN THE MORNING
SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 4 TO 6 INCHES
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE EVENING
NEW LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS AROUND 19
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS 10 TO 15
HIGHS AROUND 30

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 10 TO 15
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
